testcase.name: To create JS functions and print the data returned by JS functions
testcase.system-out: * def addTwoNum = function(x,y){ return x + y } ........................... passed Then print 'Result of 2 numbers => ', addTwoNum(12,12) .................... passed * def aNumber = function(){ return 100 } .................................. passed Then print 'Result of 2 numbers => ', aNumber() ........................... passed
